name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Week 01  Introduction
Week 02  AP1: Summer of Sam’s Club
Week 03  Games 1
Week 04  AP2: The Razor’s Edge
Week 05  Field Trip
Week 06　　Games 2
Week 07　　AP3: Get it in Gear
Week 08　　Games 3
Week 09　　MIDTERM
Week 10  AP4: Cereal Killer
Week 11 　　[Dept. Conference]
Week 12  Games 4
Week 13  AP5: Cruise Control
Week 14  Games 5
Week 15  AP6: King of the Jingle
Week 16  Games 6
Week 17  FINAL 1
Week 18　　FINAL 2
scorePolicy:
1. Class discussion/report               30%
2. Game Designing anad Leading           10%
3. Mideterm + Final (Individual)         60%
materials:
1. Videos of ”The Apprentice” Series
2. Handouts based on important expressions extracted from the videos
3. American Colloquialisms (book)
